response.original_title: LHOHQ Mind Control Video - Bob from Church of The SubGenius
response.overview: One of the media uncoverings found on the infamous LHOHQ experimental cult site https://www.lhohq.info/index.html which shows some sort of supposed mind control by displaying distorted imagery & voices by adding random clips from old movies & this all revolves around J.R Dobbs from the Church of the SubGenius
